db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates embedding a QWindow into an view hierarchy of a macOS application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
OBJECTIVE_SOURCES += main.mm HEADERS += window.h SOURCES += window.cpp LIBS += -framework Cocoa
QT += gui widgets macextras QT += widgets-private gui-private core-private
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/macextras/embeddedqwindow INSTALLS += target
